casebody.data:
DUNBAR ASPHALT PRODUCTS, INC. and Dunbar Asphalt, LLC
v.
GEM BUILDING CONTRACTORS AND DEVELOPERS, INC., Fidelity and Deposit Company of Maryland, and Conneaut School District
v.
John Roth, D/b/a Roth Paving, a/k/a Jr. Roth Paving, a/k/a Pave Masters J.M. Roth's Petition of: Gem Building Contractors and Developers, Inc. and Fidelity and Deposit Company of Maryland No. 103 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 16, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
